Sentence.sentence: By and large, these are very nice kids, and as the band The Who used to sing, The kids are alright.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Having  to install a different app for each smart appliance in your home is annoying; it would be nicer if you could  manage everything together.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: And he had a really nice appearance.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: I finally found a really nice apartment that's within my price range.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The woman should rent a nicer apartment.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: A nice video published online last month sheds light on expertise and the conscious mind.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: I think it's a nice, friendly relationship.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"愉快的，高兴的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: happy, glad, cheerful, joyful, merry, delightful, gay, pleasant, nice, jolly, agreeable
means: happy ： 侧重感到满足、幸福或高兴。
glad ： 最普通用词，语气较弱，表示礼貌的惯用语。指乐于做某事或因某事而感到满足，常表愉快的心情。
cheerful ： 多指因内心的愉快而表现出兴高采烈，是强调而自然的感情流露。
joyful ： 语气较强，强调心情或感情上的欣喜。
merry ： 指精神情绪的暂时高涨，表示欢乐、愉快的心境或情景，侧重充满欢笑声和乐趣。
delightful ： 指能带来强烈的快乐，激起愉快的情感，用于非常愉快的场合。
gay ： 侧重无忧无虑、精神昂扬、充满生命的快乐。
pleasant ： 侧重给人以"赏心悦目"或"愉快的，宜人的"感受。
nice ： 语气较温和，泛指任何愉快或满意的感觉。
jolly ： 通俗用词，多指充满快乐与喜悦的神情。
agreeable ： 指与感受者的愿望、情趣或受好等和谐一致而带来的心情上的快意。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"令人愉快的，悦人的"之意。
means: pleasant ： 普通用词，指引起感官或精神愉快的人或事物。
agreeable ： 指与某人的情趣一致适合其爱好而令其愉快中意。
nice ： 口语用词，泛指一切令人愉快的人或事物。

list.explanation: 爱抚，像哄小孩似的表示亲昵

example.en: Public officials have to make nice to politicians they cannot stand because they need their good will.
example.zh: 当官的不得不对那些难以对付的政客哄哄拍拍表示亲热，因为他们需要讨好这帮人。

list.explanation: 过分拘谨的人，(尤指在性问题上)故作正经者

example.en: a girl who's a nice Nelly with the boys
example.zh: 一个对小伙子们故意一本正经的姑娘

list.explanation: 过分拘瑾的，过分谦虚的，拘守礼仪的

example.en: My editors are being more rapidly nicc Nelly than usual.
example.zh: 我的那些编辑现在变得比平时更加拘谨了。

Sentence.sentence: A thoughtful official passed on some of the copies to the park authorities on the assumption that they might make a nice blow-up for one of the visitors' centers.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Another nice thing is that you learn both new words and their use unconsciously, meaning that you will tend to use the words learned/learnt this way in conversations almost automatically.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（11月） 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Better still, let's meet in the Red Lion Bar to have a nice little talk.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语浙江卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: But he said that they were all nice people and he couldn't imagine any of them had done that.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语北京卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: But it's quiet, and should be a nice place for an artist.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语浙江卷（10月） 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: I can tell you that what they are saying is a not nice and b not even true.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: I pushed her toward the front door, waving at the family, saying, sorry, please forgive us, you have a really nice place.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: It only has one bedroom, but it sounds nice, near lake street.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷1 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: It was the nicest gift I'd ever received, and it was from a complete stranger.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 语法填空 A 原文

Sentence.sentence: It will be nice for me, too.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: It's nice to return to learn what she loves.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷I 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: It's not a very nice thing at time.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: It's very nice, but I think your prices seem very high.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖南卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: Let's go for a nice walk into the country this afternoon.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷2 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: Nice weather we're having, don't you think?
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷1 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: Not everyone knows clearly how to build personal savings, but a savings plan started on a website has helped many put away a nice tidy sum.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语上海卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: Oh, there's a nice café about two minutes from here.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语北京卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: The color is nice, isn't it?
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷I 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: Walking through the rooms and talking with the owners, a nice elderly couple, we felt the warmth and happiness of the marriage within that home.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Wander among a variety of shops selling gifs while enjoying a live music show and nice street entertainment.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: When he brings his speech to a nice conclusion, Whaley invites the rest of the class to praise him.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷I 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: This will help to grow your internal network, in addition to being a nice break in the work day.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

means.word_mean: 美好的; 美妙的; 令人愉快的

sentences.en: It is difficult to choose between two such nice houses.
sentences.cn: 两幢房子都这么漂亮, 让人难以做出抉择。

sentences.en: It is nice to meet you.
sentences.cn: 见到你很高兴。

sentences.en: She was the nicest person I know.
sentences.cn: 她是我所认识的最和善的人。

sentences.en: There is a nice distinction between the two words.
sentences.cn: 这两个词有细微的区别。

means.word_mean: （用于形容词或副词前以加强语气）
坏的；令人不愉快的 ( 讽)
做得好的，干得好的，出色的
(穿着、习惯等)雅致的，讲究的，挑剔的
正派的，有教养的，体面的，可敬的；贞节的
须慎重的，须精细的，须细心的
敏感的，灵巧的；微妙的，难处理的

jx.jx_en_mean: (N. Amer. informal)be pleasant or polite to someone, typically in a hypocritical way
jx.jx_cn_mean: (北美，非正式)（尤指虚伪地）对某人友好（礼貌）

jx.jx_en_mean: satisfactorily or adequately in terms of the quality described
jx.jx_cn_mean: 令人满意地，恰到好处地

lj.lj_ly: it's nice and warm in here.

jx.jx_en_mean: a polite formula used on being introduced to someone
jx.jx_cn_mean: 很高兴认识你（被介绍给别人时使用的一句礼貌用语）

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)expressing approval of a task well done

phrase.cizu_name: nice work if you can get it

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)used to express envy of what is perceived to be another person's more favourable situation, especially if they seem to have reached it with little effort
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)能有那样就好了（尤用于表示对他人未花费很大努力就得到的有利条件的羡慕）

entry.def: If you say that something is nice, you mean that you find it attractive, pleasant, or enjoyable.
entry.tran: 吸引人的;美好的;令人愉快的

example.ex: I think silk ties can be quite nice...
example.tran: 我认为丝绸领带相当不错。

example.ex: It's nice to be here together again...

entry.def: If you say that it is nice of someone to say or do something, you are saying that they are being kind and thoughtful. This is often used as a way of thanking someone.
entry.tran: (常用于表示谢意)好心的，体贴人的

example.ex: It's awfully nice of you to come all this way to see me...
example.tran: 你真是太好了，大老远来看我。

example.ex: 'How are your boys?' — 'How nice of you to ask.'...
example.tran: “你的几个儿子好么？”——“谢谢关心。”

entry.def: If you say that someone is nice, you mean that you like them because they are friendly and pleasant.

example.ex: I've met your father and he's rather nice...
example.tran: 我已经见过你爸爸了，他非常和蔼可亲。

example.ex: He was a nice fellow, very quiet and courteous.
example.tran: 他是个好小伙，非常温和，彬彬有礼。

entry.def: If you are nice to people, you are friendly, pleasant, or polite towards them.

example.ex: She met Mr and Mrs Ricciardi, who were very nice to her.
example.tran: 她见到了里恰尔迪夫妇，他们对她非常友好。

entry.def: When the weather is nice, it is warm and pleasant.

example.ex: He nodded to us and said, 'Nice weather we're having.'
example.tran: 他冲我们点点头，说道：“天气真不错。”

entry.def: You can use nice to emphasize a particular quality that you like.
entry.tran: (用于加强语气)美好的，令人喜爱的

example.ex: With a nice dark colour, the wine is medium to full bodied...
example.tran: 这种葡萄酒色泽深暗悦目，是中等浓郁至浓香型的。

example.ex: People have got used to nice glossy magazines...
example.tran: 人们已经习惯了用精美的亮光纸印刷的杂志了。

entry.def: A nice point or distinction is very clear, precise, and based on good reasoning.
entry.tran: (观点、区别等)细致的，微妙的，精细的

example.ex: Those are nice academic arguments, but what about the immediate future?
example.tran: 那些是微妙的学术上的辩论，但不久的将来怎么办？

entry.def: You can use nice when you are greeting people. For example, you can say 'Nice to meet you', 'Nice to have met you', or 'Nice to see you'.

example.ex: Good morning. Nice to meet you and thanks for being with us this weekend...
example.tran: 早上好！见到你真高兴，感谢你和我们共度这个周末。

example.ex: 'It's so nice to see you,' said Charles.
example.tran: 查尔斯说：“见到你真是太高兴了。”

entry.def: If someone says nice one, they are showing their approval of something clever or funny that they have just seen or heard.

example.ex: Knowles became Torquay's manager. Nice one.
example.tran: 诺尔斯成了托奇酒店的经理，干得很棒。

means.word_mean: 1. pleasant or pleasing or agreeable in nature or appearance;

sentences.sentence: "what a nice fellow you are and we all thought you so nasty"- George Meredith
"had a nice time at the party"
"the corn and tomatoes are nice today"

means.word_mean: 2. socially or conventionally correct; refined or virtuous;

sentences.sentence: "a job requiring nice measurements with a micrometer"
"too nice about his food to take to camp cooking"
"so squeamish he would only touch the toilet handle with his elbow"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'stupid'): from Old French, from Latin nescius 'ignorant', from nescire 'not know'. Other early senses included 'coy, reserved', giving rise to 'fastidious, scrupulous': this led both to the sense 'fine, subtle' (regarded by some as the ‘correct’ sense), and to the main current senses

sentences.en: You look very nice.

sentences.en: It's nice to know that somebody appreciates what I do.

sentences.cn: 真不走运——上周我们都得了流感。

sentences.en: 'It's so nice to see you,' said Charles.

sentences.cn: 诺尔斯成了托奇酒店的经理，干得很棒。
sentences.en: Knowles became Torquay's manager. Nice one.

sentences.cn: 跟老朋友聊天是很美好的事.
sentences.en: It's nice shoot the breeze with an old friend.

sentences.cn: 而我会很愿意给你买昂贵美好的礼物, 希望它们能够配得上你.
sentences.en: But am eager to buy really nice, expensive things for you, and hope they suit you.

sentences.cn: 春天是一年中美好的一段时光.
sentences.en: Spring is a nice time of a year.

sentences.cn: 和美好的人说话, 为真正的和在电话.
sentences.en: Talked to nice people, for real as well as at the phone.

sentences.cn: 总有一种可能,竟然让酒精和女孩儿的糟糕判断形成了一个美好的浪漫之夜.
sentences.en: There's always the possibility that alcohol and poor judgment on herlead to a nice romantic evening.

sentences.cn: 这个手术会有一个漫长而美好的修养期 吗 ?
sentences.en: Does this operation have a nice, long recovery time?

sentences.cn: 我计划在夏天度过一个美好的假日, 因此我将离开.
sentences.en: I am planning to have a nice holiday in summer, so am leaving.

sentences.cn: 一年中最美好的月份是哪几个月?
sentences.en: Which month are the nicest month of the year?

sentences.cn: 那是一个美好的晴天.
sentences.en: It is a nice day.

sentences.cn: 等待看到你尽快回复, 有美好的一天.
sentences.en: Awaiting to see your lovely reply soonest, have a nice day.

sentences.cn: 这是我做过的最美好的白日梦了.
sentences.en: It's quite the nicest daydream I ever had.

sentences.cn: 美好的一天送上我最美好的祝福.
sentences.en: Have a nice day and give my best wishes to you.

sentences.cn: 似乎是个美好的晴天, 对 吧 ?
sentences.en: It'seems to be a nice day, does not it ?

sentences.cn: 那麽直到那时, 也是美好的时刻!
sentences.en: So until then, and a nice time!

sentences.cn: 好笑而令人惊异的. 美好的编辑. 好歌和生计比较棒的电影来临!
sentences.en: Funny and amazing. Nice editing. good song and keep more great movies coming!

sentences.cn: 本应是一次美好的剧院之行却在几分钟内导致了婚姻的破裂.
sentences.en: A nice trip to the theatre reduced to marital disintegration in minutes.

sentences.cn: 四天后, 我们不克不及不分开这个美好的处所.
sentences.en: After 4 days, we have to leave this nice place.

sentences.cn: 洛杉矶是一个比我想像中更美好的地方.
sentences.en: Los Angeles is a nicer place than I thought.

sentences.cn: 一个可携式电子文件下载会很很棒当会之时和MMP文件 美好的,也.
sentences.en: A PDF download would be great as would and the MMP file nice too.

sentences.cn: 阿里爸爸总是在期待美好的明天, 于是他为自己的希望去努力.
sentences.en: Ali's father was always hoping for a nice future, and he tried hard for his hope.

sentences.cn: 这真是一个美好的宴会.
sentences.en: It a very nice party.

sentences.cn: 他唯一说的一句话就是, “ 多么美好的一天? ~”
sentences.en: All he can say is,'Man ain't It'such a nice day?'

sentences.cn: 你曾见过比这个地方更美好的地方 吗 ?
sentences.en: Have you ever seen a nicer place nor this one?

sentences.cn: 我希望生活中最美好的东西都将专门为你而来.
sentences.en: I'm hoping that the nicest things in life will come especially to you.

sentences.cn: 这是一个美好的想法, 但并不够.
sentences.en: It's a nice idea, but it isn't enough.

sentences.cn: 九月和十月是一年中最美好的月份.
sentences.en: September and October are the nicest month of the year.

sentences.cn: 美好的树阴而且树很容易爬上去,我和老师一起爬了上去.
sentences.en: The shade was nice and the tree was easy to climb.

sentences.cn: 在这美好的春天里,开心的笑一下, 好运会将紧紧包围的.
sentences.en: Smile amusedly, and the good luck will surround you closely in this nice spring.

sentences.cn: 这就是, 先生, 祝你有一个美好的一天.
sentences.en: A: Here you are, sir. Have a nice day.

sentences.cn: 只要我们共同努力,一切美好的未来将很快到来!
sentences.en: The nice dream could and would come true if we contrive for it.

sentences.cn: 长时间很愉快的散步
sentences.en: a nice long walk

sentences.cn: 他们用优美动听、轻松愉快的语调开始晨播.
sentences.en: They use a nice cheerful tune to sign on in the morning.

sentences.cn: 谢谢你,祝你度过愉快的一天.
sentences.en: Goodbye and have a nice day.

sentences.cn: 祝你们过一个愉快的夜晚.
sentences.en: Have a nice evening.

sentences.cn: 每天把报纸放在我家门口是一件令人愉快的事.
sentences.en: It is nice to have the papers dropped off at my door each day.

sentences.cn: 度过一个这么愉快的夜晚真是非常感谢你.
sentences.en: Thank you very much indeed for the nice evening.

sentences.cn: 有教养的人不谈这种令人不愉快的事.
sentences.en: Nice people don't speak about such unpleasant matters.

sentences.cn: 度过了愉快的假日之后,很难一下子静下心来工作.
sentences.en: It's hard to get down to work after a nice holiday.

sentences.cn: 华里斯先生: 谢谢你, 祝你有愉快的一天.
sentences.en: Mr. Wallace: Thank you. Have a nice day.

sentences.cn: 先生, 祝您有愉快的一天!
sentences.en: Have a nice day, sir.

sentences.cn: 签证官: 谢谢. 祝你有愉快的一天.
sentences.en: VO: Thank you! Have a nice day.

sentences.cn: 祝您有一个愉快的夜晚.
sentences.en: Hope you have a nice evening.

sentences.cn: 当晚有大概50人出席,我们过了一个很愉快的晚上.
sentences.en: There were about 50 people who came and we had a really nice time.

sentences.cn: 祝您一路顺风! 有一趟愉快的旅行.
sentences.en: Bon voyage! Have a nice trip.

sentences.cn: 就天气而言, 我们的旅行是愉快的.
sentences.en: As far as the weather is concerned, we have a nice trip.

sentences.cn: 我希望我们能有一个愉快的飞行.
sentences.en: I hope we can have a nice flight.

sentences.cn: 不过至少能去见蕾逖也是令人愉快的.
sentences.en: Still, it would be nice to see Lettie.

sentences.cn: 我希望能享受一个愉快的周末.
sentences.en: I hope I enjoy a nice weekend.

sentences.cn: 约翰逊: 是的, 愉快,这是一次非常愉快的旅行.
sentences.en: Wilson: Yes, quite a nice flight.

sentences.cn: 在这里陪你坐着是非常愉快的.
sentences.en: It's nice to be sitting here with you.

sentences.cn: 夏季学期总是令人愉快的.
sentences.en: The summer term is always nice.

sentences.cn: 这是您的帐单. 谢谢您,祝您有个愉快的夜晚.
sentences.en: Here you are. Thank you and have a nice evening.

sentences.cn: 感谢,并度过了愉快的一天.
sentences.en: Thanks and have a nice day.

sentences.cn: 先生, 祝您有个愉快的日子 ( 下午, 夜晚 )!
sentences.en: Have a nice day ( afternoon, evening ), sir.

sentences.cn: 当你第一次和别人见面时,保持目光接触和微笑总是令人愉快的.
sentences.en: When you meet people the first time it's always nice to make eye contact and smile.

sentences.cn: 在期末考试中取得好成绩, 并且 过一个愉快的 寒假!
sentences.en: Try your best in the test & have a nice holiday & Happy New Year !

sentences.cn: 你假期中最愉快的是哪一段时间?
sentences.en: What is nicest part of your holidays?

sentences.cn: 希望过一个愉快的周末.
sentences.en: I hope you will have a nice weekend.

sentences.cn: 大家尽力做任何让母亲愉快的事.
sentences.en: They try to do whatever is nice for their mothers.

sentences.cn: 晚饭将于6点开始,这样我们就能够享受一个漫长且愉快的夜晚.
sentences.en: The dinner starts at 6 pm so that we can have a nice and long evening.

sentences.cn: 很难憎恨这么冷静 、 勤劳和正派的人.
sentences.en: Sober , diligent, nice people are hard to hate.

sentences.cn: 我没参加那场葬礼, 不过已经发了一封很友好的信说明我同意葬礼举行了.
sentences.en: I didn't attend the funeral, but I sent a nice letter saying I approved of it.

sentences.cn: 这家餐馆的主人是个很友好的法国人.
sentences.en: The owner of the restaurant is a very nice Frenchman.

sentences.cn: 那是我碰见过最友好的坏小子.
sentences.en: That was the nicest evil guy I've ever met.

sentences.cn: 你的生活中一定会有并不友好的人.
sentences.en: There will be people in your life who won't be very nice.

sentences.cn: 我从不参加葬礼, 但我会写封亲切的信表明我是赞成葬礼的.
sentences.en: I didn't attend the funeral , I sent a nice letter saying that I approved of it.

sentences.cn: 细致的印花布, 非常挺!
sentences.en: Very beautiful printed fabric , nice shape!

Sentence.sentence: The nice thing about ancient philosophy as offered by the Greeks is that they tended to see life clear and whole, in a way that we tend not to see life today.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It's nice to have people of like mind around.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It's nice to have people agree, but you need conflicting perspectives to dig out the truth.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Those whose accommodation had more natural views showed an improvement of 19%; those who had the same improvement in material surroundings but no nice view improved just 4%.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Anyone who has patted a dog, stroked a cat, sat under a tree with a pint of beer, given or received a bunch of flowers or chosen to walk through the park on a nice day, understands that
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: I thought it would be nice to be near to the family.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: I bought a new suit for work and took my parents to a nice restaurant to celebrate.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: I mean a lot of people seem to think that it's a nice job, you know.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: If you've got a good car that can go at a high speed, then it's really nice to do that.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: That was actually Songdo, " says Jung Won Son, a professor of urban development at London's Bartlett School of Planning, "Part of the reason to shoot there is that it's new and nice.

Sentence.sentence: When she started saying nice things about Hitler, microsoft turned her off and deleted her ugliest messages.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月四级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C
